message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $100.  It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $85. I hope this works for you!

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, $85 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $95, which is still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement at that price.
